body_html: Actually, the gradients of ReLU are not computed in-place, even if ReLU is in-place (at least that was the behaviour before merging operations in ATen I believe). Did this behaviour change over time?
body_text: Actually, the gradients of ReLU are not computed in-place, even if ReLU is in-place (at least that was the behaviour before merging operations in ATen I believe). Did this behaviour change over time?
body: Actually, the gradients of `ReLU` are not computed in-place, even if ReLU is in-place ([at least that was the behaviour before merging operations in ATen](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/_functions/thnn/auto.py#L238) I believe). Did this behaviour change over time?
